bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Fix restart with copy mode in CE
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
polyaxon ops restart --copy does not copy the outputs from previous run.
Seems like the resolver for the copy was not cherry-picked, should be fixed for 1.0.99-rc3. Also probably related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/polyaxon/polyaxon/issues/827>#827</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
1.0.99-rc2
